subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Five years ago, Dirk Nowitzki and the Mavericks let a championship slip away. They made amends against a Heat team that had more problems than just missed shots and turnovers.
snippet: Five years ago, Dirk Nowitzki and the Mavericks let a championship slip away. They made amends against a Heat team that had more problems than just missed shots and turnovers.
